derivation: from a presumed derivative of G2476 (στηρίζω) (like G4731 (στηρίζω));
strongs_def: to set fast, i.e. (literally) to turn resolutely in a certain direction, or (figuratively) to confirm
outline:
1. to make stable, place firmly, set fast, fix
  2. to strengthen, make firm
  3. to render constant, confirm, one's mind
